metadata.title: You Were Wrong
metadata.songInfo: by Hill recording of 1972 from The Texas Cannonball (Capitol 53867B) ,

xml.lyrics:
You were wrong, you were wrong You were wrong, yeah, you were wrong You were wrong, baby, stayin' away too long You know it ain't right, it ain't right, It ain't right, it ain't right It ain't right, stayin' out all night
I try and I try with all my might, to do the thing that's right No matter how good I treat you baby, you only wanna fuss and fight You were wrong, you were wrong You were wrong, yeah, you were wrong You were wrong, baby, stayin' away too long You know it ain't right, it ain't right
I ask myself, and I ask myself, and ask myself again, How can you do the things that right, when you keep on livin' in sin? You were wrong, you were wrong You were wrong, yeah, you were wrong You were wrong, baby, stayin' away too long You know it ain't right, it ain't right
